title: the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 3(3) of that
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Trade Marks (Madrid Protocol)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Trade Marks (Madrid Protocol) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2024.

title: the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 3(3) of that
heading: 2. Regulation 21(1)(a) of S.I. No. 346/2001 Trade Marks (Madrid Protocol)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 21(1)(a) of S.I. No. 346/2001 Trade Marks (Madrid Protocol) 

Regulations, 2001 is amended – 

(i) by the substitution of “all the goods and services” for “at least 

some of the goods and services”.
text_norm: 2 regulation 21(1)(a) s.i no 346 2001 trade mark (madrid protocol) regulation 2001 amended - (i) substitution good service least good service

title: the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 3(3) of that
heading: 3. The Form No. 2M set out in Part 1 of the Schedule to these Regulations
text_raw:
3. The Form No. 2M set out in Part 1 of the Schedule to these Regulations 
is substituted for the Form No. 2M set out in Part 2 of the Schedule to the 2001 
Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [558] 3 

Regulation 21 (2)
text_norm: 3 form no 2m set part 1 schedule regulation substituted form no 2m set part 2 schedule 2001 regulation notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th october 2024 558 3 regulation 21 (2)

title: the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 3(3) of that
heading: Form No. 2M
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Form No. 2M 

APPLICATION TO CONTROLLER UNDER REGULATION 21(2) OF 
TRADE MARKS (MADRID PROTOCOL) REGULATIONS, 2001. 

Reference No. of Applicant or 

Authorised Agent…………… 

Application is hereby submitted to the Controller to note in the Register of Trade 
Marks, in relation to the registered trade mark indicated below, the particulars of 
the international registration indicated below.

title: the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 3(3) of that
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend S.I. No. 346/2001 - Trade Marks (Madrid Protocol) 
Regulations, 2001 to provide that the replacement of an earlier national or 
regional trade mark registration by an international trade mark registration can 
be partial, namely for only some of the goods and services covered by the 
national or regional trade mark registration to be listed in the international 
registration. 

These Regulations also provide for a new Form No. 2M to allow the holder of 
an international trade mark to select a full or partial replacement of the goods or 
services to which the international trade mark registration applies. Form No. 2M 
is also amended to reflect the new name of the ‘Controller of Intellectual 
Property’ and the change of name of the Office to the ‘Intellectual Property 
Office of Ireland’. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [558]
